page.title: 14WARE WEEK
page.content: In Ware it is the tradition for the last 15 years to hold a carnival and a week full if competitions and other events.On Ssunday,2nd of June,Ware Round Table organised a {10 mile Fun {Run.}It started and finished at Western House.At the end each runner eceived a certificate and a Mars bar.Some of the 1,200 people who entered the race won shields or cups. {The fair}comes on the Friday morning before Ware Week.There are gravity wheels,twisters,a few stalls,mini roundabout,aeroplane rides,a helter skelter,food stalls and bumper cars. Some rides are dangerous for children under 10.On Wednesday all rides are half price and that is the night they pack up and leave.
